displayProperties.name: Overload Rounds (Auto Rifle)
displayProperties.description:
Landing sustained hits on combatants with any Auto Rifle you are wielding causes [Disruption] disruption, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. 

After any member of your fireteam disrupts a Champion, your Auto Rifles gain a temporary bonus to damage against Champions.

Strong against Overload Champions.

displayProperties.description: This weapon's projectiles create Stasis crystals and freeze nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath
displayProperties.description:
Summon a Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

  : Cast out a barrage of Stasis shards that freeze targets.

  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

Solar and Stasis grenades cause [Disruption] disruption, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Cryoclasm

displayProperties.name: Shotgun Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chance of finding ammo while you have a Shotgun equipped.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming damage from combatants that are at long range.

displayProperties.name: Frostpulse
displayProperties.description: Casting your Rift generates a shockwave that freezes nearby combatants.

displayProperties.name: Recombination
displayProperties.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot.

displayProperties.name: Strange Signal
displayProperties.description: The Vex were responding to a strange signal coming from Nexus…

displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, defeating combatants with melee damage and Swords spawns 1 Orb of Power for your allies and consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.description: Reduces class ability cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Better Already
displayProperties.description: Your health begins to regenerate immediately after picking up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Argent Ordnance
displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, readying or firing a Rocket Launcher grants it increased damage and reload speed. Damaging a combatant with a rocket consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.description: Reduces melee cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Recuperation
displayProperties.description: Replenishes health each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.description: Fire Shadowshot multiple times in rapid succession. Shadowshot deals massive damage against tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power and grants nearby allies the Heart of the Pack buff.
